tab1.title1: First of all, have a great time!
tab1.text1:
<TextStyle.Green>We’re thrilled</> to have you with us on this epic journey.
In ARK you’ll gather resources, craft items, and build shelters to survive the challenges ahead.

As you explore the world, you’ll encounter many creatures—some friendly, some hostile. Tame and train them to turn them into valuable allies.

Our server has a friendly, active community that’s happy to help new players. Join our Discord to stay up to date with news, events, and updates.
tab1.text2:
● Reliable, always-online servers with solid hardware
● Interesting, curated mods
● Balanced settings (and the occasional crazy server for fun!)
● Support from admins, helpers, and fellow players
● Strictly non-toxic environment
● Real influence on server development via suggestions and polls

Thanks for choosing our ASA servers — <TextStyle.Green>have fun!</>

tab2.title1: This is a PvE server — be respectful.
tab2.text1:
<TextStyle.Green>Keyboard shortcuts</>
● F1 – WBUI INFO
● F3 – VOTE
● F4 – REPORT
● F6 – RATE COMMUNITY

Console players can access <TextStyle.Green>function keys</> by holding <TextStyle.Green>X</> on Xbox or <TextStyle.Green>□</> on PlayStation.

When you vote you’ll receive 200 tokens (more for Supporters!). Use <TextStyle.Green>!Claim</> in <TextStyle.Green>#bot-spam</> on Discord after voting.
tab2.text2:
● Thatch – 4d
● Wood – 8d
● Stone – 12d
● Metal – 16d
● Creatures – 8d

To collect <TextStyle.Green>tokens</> properly, link your in-game character with your website account. After <TextStyle.Green>connecting accounts</>, all tokens (voting, playtime, Supporter) will auto-assign.

tab3.text1:
● Racism, homophobia, or toxic harassment
● Hacking, cheating, exploiting
tab3.text2:
● Keep the game enjoyable for everyone
● Help fellow survivors
● Don’t block public places (volcano, spawns, obelisks, artifact caves). Drops & explorer notes are fine.
● Clean up after yourself • No mass land grabs • No pillar/foundation spam
● No massive bases — use common sense; max 1 tribe base + 1 personal outpost per player
● No PvP • No griefing • No stealing
● Respect base boundaries — don’t build too close • Avoid excessive breeding
● Don’t beg for help — ask nicely; if someone can, they will 🙂
